actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit export of Alaska Oil.

summary.text: Amends the Export Administration Act of 1969 to prohibit the exportation from the United States, its territories and possessions, of domestically produced crude oil transported by pipeline over rights-of-way granted pursuant to the Trans-Alaska Pipeline Authorization Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit export of Alaska Oil.
